text: Atahpara musa tara sampradayera kache phire gelena krud'dha o ksubdha haye [1]. Tini balalena, â€˜he amara sampradaya! Tomadera raba ki tomaderake eka uttama pratisruti denani [2]? Tabe ki pratisruti kala tomadera kache sudirgha hayeche [3]? Na tomara ceyecha tomadera prati apatita hoka tomadera rabera krodha [4], ye karane tomara amake deya angikara [5] bhanga karale
